resources.string: Ba za a iya samun kayan aikin da kuka nema ba
Kayan aikin da kuka nema yana lodawa…
Kayan aikin da kuka nema yana buƙatar haɗin Intanet don buɗewa
Da fatan za a shigar da ingantaccen adireshin imel

Wannan hanyar haɗin zai kai ku zuwa sigar yanar gizo ta abin da muke magana akai a yau: %1$s 


Zaku iya saukar da app din zuwa wayar ku daga https://godtoolsapp.com 


Bari mu kara magana!
Ina so in raba wannan labarin tare da ku kuma ina so in ji ra\'ayoyin ku game da shi. %1$s
Aika wannan kayan aikin zuwa aboki ta danna wannan gunkin
Juya tsakanin harsuna biyu daban-daban a cikin wannan kayan aikin.
